PlaceIQ | Software Engineers, Architect, Data Scientist | New York, REMOTE

PlaceIQ turns location data into business intelligence. We value curious, driven, people who enjoy managing and/or analyzing mountains of location and map data. We are based in Manhattan (though remote candidates are welcome to apply).

We are currently growing and have multiple positions to fill, specifically:

- Software Architect - Senior Software Engineer - Data Scientist

Experience with Scala, Hadoop, Spark, and general data engineering appreciated.

More info: https://www.placeiq.com/careers
